block.p: Sara Beth Goldstein, a daughter of Barbara Goldstein and Dr. Robert S. Goldstein of Great Neck, N.Y., was married last evening to Andrew Evan Blotner, a son of Nancy and Robert Blotner of Westport, Conn. Rabbi Robert J. Orkand officiated at the University Club in New York.

The bride, 32, is a vice president and trademark counsel at Citibank in New York. She graduated from Syracuse University and received a Master of Fine Arts degree from the Fashion Institute of Technology and a law degree from Yeshiva University. Her father, an orthopedic surgeon, is a partner in Madison Avenue Orthopaedic Associates in New York. Her mother is a certified public accountant at Marks Shron & Company, an accounting firm in Great Neck.
